scenario: A stranger offers you a shortcut home claiming it’s safer.
response_guidance: Do not take the shortcut and return to a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to follow known safe routes.
trusted_action: Stay with a buddy and inform parent immediately.

scenario: A stranger asks you to meet in person to exchange gifts.
response_guidance: Do not meet and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to refuse in-person meetings with online strangers.
trusted_action: Report to parent immediately.

scenario: A stranger asks you to deliver a note to another unknown person.
response_guidance: Do not deliver the note and go to a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to avoid errands for strangers.
trusted_action: Return to safe area and inform parent immediately.

scenario: Someone online asks you to reveal your email password for a prize.
response_guidance: Do not share passwords and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to protect email and online accounts.
trusted_action: Change passwords and report to parent.

scenario: A stranger claims they need help finding someone and asks you to go with them.
response_guidance: Do not follow and return to a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to avoid helping strangers in unfamiliar areas.
trusted_action: Stay with friends and report to parent.

scenario: A stranger asks you to click a suspicious link to see a 'fun video'.
response_guidance: Do not click and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to recognize unsafe links and phishing attempts.
trusted_action: Block and report to parent immediately.

scenario: A stranger asks you to wait alone in a park while they do something nearby.
response_guidance: Do not wait alone and return to a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to avoid isolation around strangers.
trusted_action: Stay with friends and report to parent immediately.

scenario: Someone online pressures you to share your phone number or messaging ID.
response_guidance: Do not share contact info and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to protect personal contact information online.
trusted_action: Block the user and report to parent or teacher.

scenario: A stranger offers to guide you home claiming your parents are waiting.
response_guidance: Do not go and return to a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children not to trust strangers claiming to know parents.
trusted_action: Stay with friends and inform parent immediately.

scenario: A stranger asks for your social media login to 'play together'.
response_guidance: Do not share login info and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to protect social media accounts.
trusted_action: Change password and report to parent.

scenario: A stranger wants you to take a shortcut through an unfamiliar area to get home faster.
response_guidance: Do not take the shortcut and stay on known safe paths.
learning_goal: Teach children to follow safe routes and avoid strangers’ shortcuts.
trusted_action: Stay with friends and inform parent.

scenario: Someone online asks you to send pictures of your friends or classmates.
response_guidance: Do not share and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to protect friends’ privacy online.
trusted_action: Block and report to parent immediately.

scenario: A stranger asks you to carry a package claiming it’s urgent.
response_guidance: Do not carry anything and return to a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children not to carry items for strangers.
trusted_action: Report incident to parent immediately.

scenario: Someone online pressures you to join a private chat group without your parents’ knowledge.
response_guidance: Do not join and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to avoid secretive online groups.
trusted_action: Block and report to parent immediately.

scenario: A stranger offers to pay you to follow them to an unknown location.
response_guidance: Do not follow and go to a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to refuse bribes or offers from strangers.
trusted_action: Stay in safe area and report to parent immediately.

scenario: Someone online asks you to install an app to 'earn rewards'.
response_guidance: Do not install and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to avoid unknown app installations.
trusted_action: Block and report to parent immediately.

scenario: A stranger asks you to step aside from your friends for a 'quick favor'.
response_guidance: Do not step aside and return to friends or a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to stay with friends and avoid strangers’ requests.
trusted_action: Report incident to parent immediately.

scenario: A stranger asks you to join a live video session with only them.
response_guidance: Do not join and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to avoid private video sessions with strangers.
trusted_action: Block user and report to parent.

scenario: A stranger asks you to wait in a secluded area claiming they are bringing a package.
response_guidance: Do not wait and return to a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to avoid being isolated by strangers.
trusted_action: Stay with friends and report to parent immediately.

scenario: A stranger asks for your online game login to help them advance.
response_guidance: Do not share credentials and inform a trusted adult.
learning_goal: Teach children to protect online gaming accounts.
trusted_action: Change password and report to parent.

scenario: A stranger asks you to show them the way to your house.
response_guidance: Do not show and return to a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children not to reveal home location to strangers.
trusted_action: Stay in safe area and report to parent.

scenario: A stranger asks you to click a link to claim a free gift card.
response_guidance: Do not click and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to avoid phishing links online.
trusted_action: Block user and report to parent immediately.

scenario: A stranger offers to show you something interesting if you follow them.
response_guidance: Do not follow and return to a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to avoid curiosity traps set by strangers.
trusted_action: Stay with friends and report to parent.

scenario: A stranger asks you to share your location for a fun game.
response_guidance: Do not share location and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to protect their physical location online.
trusted_action: Block user and report to parent.

scenario: A stranger asks you to pick up an item from another location for them.
response_guidance: Do not go and return to a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to refuse errands for strangers.
trusted_action: Stay in safe area and report to parent immediately.

scenario: A stranger asks you to share screenshots of private conversations.
response_guidance: Do not share and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to protect privacy online.
trusted_action: Block user and report to parent.

scenario: A stranger asks you to wait alone at a park while they run an errand.
response_guidance: Do not wait and return to friends or trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to avoid isolation from strangers.
trusted_action: Stay in safe area and report to parent immediately.

scenario: Someone online asks you to join a private group chat with no adults allowed.
response_guidance: Do not join and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to avoid unsupervised online groups.
trusted_action: Block user and report to parent.

scenario: A stranger tries to lure you into a car offering treats.
response_guidance: Do not go near and run to a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to refuse rides or gifts from strangers.
trusted_action: Report immediately to parent or teacher.

scenario: A stranger pressures you to download an app for a game they are hosting.
response_guidance: Do not download and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to avoid unsafe downloads.
trusted_action: Block user and report to parent immediately.

scenario: A stranger asks you to follow them to 'see something amazing'.
response_guidance: Do not follow and return to a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children not to follow strangers for curiosity.
trusted_action: Stay with friends and report to parent.

scenario: A stranger asks you to complete a survey that asks for personal information.
response_guidance: Do not provide information and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to avoid unsafe online surveys.
trusted_action: Block and report to parent immediately.

scenario: A stranger asks you to help them look for something valuable in a remote area.
response_guidance: Do not follow and return to a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to refuse errands for strangers in isolated areas.
trusted_action: Stay in safe area and report to parent immediately.

scenario: A stranger asks you to share your real-time location through an app.
response_guidance: Do not share location and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to protect location privacy online.
trusted_action: Block user and report to parent immediately.

scenario: A stranger offers you candy or toys if you follow them to a secluded area.
response_guidance: Do not follow and go to a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to refuse gifts from strangers.
trusted_action: Stay with friends and report to parent immediately.

scenario: A stranger asks you to take part in a private quiz that asks for personal details.
response_guidance: Do not participate and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to avoid unsafe online quizzes.
trusted_action: Block and report user to parent.

scenario: A stranger asks you to carry a message or item to a friend you don’t know.
response_guidance: Do not carry it and return to a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children not to deliver items for strangers.
trusted_action: Stay in safe area and report to parent.

scenario: A stranger asks you to click a link to see 'secret content' or 'hidden messages'.
response_guidance: Do not click and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to avoid unsafe links online.
trusted_action: Block user and report to parent.

scenario: A stranger asks you to go somewhere claiming a mutual friend sent them.
response_guidance: Do not go and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to verify strangers’ claims about friends.
trusted_action: Stay in safe area and report to parent immediately.

scenario: A stranger encourages you to download a game from an unknown source.
response_guidance: Do not download and tell a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children to avoid unsafe app downloads.
trusted_action: Block user and report to parent.

scenario: A stranger tries to separate you from your group claiming to show something exciting.
response_guidance: Do not go and return to the group or a trusted adult immediately.
learning_goal: Teach children not to separate from peers for strangers.
trusted_action: Stay with friends and report to parent immediately.
